contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox City Japan |Name= Urakawa |JapaneseName= 浦河町 |settlement_type= Town |MapImage= Urakawa in Hidaka Subprefecture.gif |Region= [[Hokkaidō]] |Prefecture= [[Hokkaidō]] ([[Hidaka Subprefecture|Hidaka]]) |District=[[Urakawa District, Hokkaidō|Urakawa District]] |Area_km2=694.24 |PopDate=March 2008 |Population=14,814 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees= 42 |LatitudeMinutes= 10 |LatitudeSeconds= |LongtitudeDegrees= 142 |LongtitudeMinutes= 46 |LongtitudeSeconds= |Tree=Hidaka [[Japanese White Pine]] |Flower=Hidaka Yamatsutsuji <small>([[Rhododendron]] kaempferi var. kaempferi)</small> |Bird= |SymbolImage= Flag of Urakawa, Hokkaido.png |SymbolDescription= Flag |Mayor= [[Kōichirō Tanikawa]] |CityHallPostalCode=057-8511 |CityHallAddress=1-3-1, Tsukiji, Urakawa-chō, Urakawa-gun, Hokkaidō |CityHallPhone=0146-22-2311 |CityHallLink= [http://www.town.urakawa.hokkaido.jp/ Urakawa Town] }} {{nihongo|'''Urakawa'''|浦河町|Urakawa-chō}} is a town located in [[Urakawa District, Hokkaidō|Urakawa District]], [[Hidaka Subprefecture|Hidaka]], [[Hokkaidō]], [[Japan]]. As of 2008, the town has an estimated [[population]] of 14,814 and a [[population density|density]] of 21.3 persons per km². The total area is 694.24 km². ==Climate== Urakawa has a [[humid continental climate]] ([[Köppen climate classification]] ''Dfb'') bordering on an [[oceanic climate]] ([[Köppen climate classification]] ''Cfb'') with warm summers and cold winters. Precipitation is significant throughout the year, but is heaviest from May to October. <div style="width:75%;"> {{Weather box |location = Omu |single line = Y |metric first = Y |Jan high C = 0.2 |Feb
